roleset.name: to make wet
roleset.note: WATER-V NOTES: Frames file for 'water' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from water.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Last Sunday , [Ms. Johnson]-1 finally got a chance [*-1]to water her plants , but stopped abruptly .

roleset.name: to reduce the strength or effectiveness of

example.name: transitive
example.text: If it promotes fashion too much , the shop risks [*-1] alienating its old-line customers ; by [*-2]emphasizing `` value , '' [it]-2 risks [*-2] watering down its high-minded mystique .

roleset.name: permeated with water
roleset.note: WATERY-J NOTES: Added automatically by Julia. (from watery.01-j)

example.text: Breakfast was a little weak, the diced ham was watery the eggs powdery.
